alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 11:24PM CDT until May 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Northwestern Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crossett to 10 miles northwest of Sterlington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bastrop, Wilmot, Jones, Berlin, Beekman, Galion and Bonita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
